ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Skill Increases
ygData.msgSnippet: I set-up a profit sharing program within my guild.  They threw in some cash loans and I repaid them in full plus a small percentage on revenues generated
ygData.messageBody:
I set-up a profit sharing program within my guild. They threw in some
cash loans and I repaid them in full plus a small percentage on revenues
generated through selling RB's.

Worked very well and everyone was happy to make a little extra pp.

QdP


--- jcs0001@... wrote: > Ok i have a question. how in the world are
you all getting
> multi-thousands
> of platinum?
>
> I think the most ive ever owned is 2250pp at one time, and that was
> after a
> LOT of saving...
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Quasinom de Plume [mailto:eqmailing@...]
> Sent: Monday, November 27, 2000 11:21 AM
> To: EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Skill Increases
>
>
> Greetings:
>
> Unfortunately you are experiencing normal skill growth for Rebreathers.
> My skill is now 150 after attempting to make over 50 of them with max
> Int
> of 212 and Dex of 115. (Not sure if dexterity plays a role in Tinkering
> -
> would make sense as we are dealing with tiny mechanisms and a steady
> hand
> is needed.)
>
> Personaly I really hope they enhance the amount of skill increases for
> the
> SoV tinkering fix. Right now it's costing me a little over 15k pp per
> skill point. At the current rate it will cost me over 760k pp to reach
> 200 skill!!!!
>
> /em shakes his head in disbelief
>
> QdP
> 52 Gnomish Magi
> Ilsik Haucil
> Mith Marr
>
> "Quasinom de Plume is my quasi nom-de-plume"
>
>

> am.
